name: Cloud Runner
description:
Cloud Runner

Description

Infinite cloud runner made for OpenJam 2020 which theme was "AIRBORNE".

Controls
  • left: left arrow or controller left stick left
  • right: left arrow or controller left stick right
  • jump: up arrow or controller button 0 (DualShock Cross. Xbox A, Nintendo B)
Tools used
  • Godot
  • LibreSprite
  • Free Texture Packer
Resources credits
  • pixel-clouds based on ALL CLOUDS
  • ninja-frog from Pixel Adventure 1
  • parallax mountains from Background Desert Mountains
  • coin from Spinning pixel coin
  • font from Pixelated
  • sky from Sky gradients pack 1
Source code on GitHub
